name: Cube Crusher | 3D Runner
description:
'Cube Crusher' is the hottest 3d runner on the AppStore!
Hold your finger on the screen and move it freely across the screen to move the cube crusher around, avoid obstacles while crushing them with your projectiles, and collect as many bonus points as you can!
- Collect enough bonus points to crush your way to the next level !
- Various power-ups available !
- Fun and easy-to-play !
